ogTitle: quote of the day: idina menzel
ogDescription: this famous singer reminds us about having the right priority while following our dreams.

card_1.cardText:
> _“When you sit back and you just do what you love, things happen.a_

Idina Menzel

card_10.cardText:
Idina Menzel, speaking about lessons learned during her career. Menzel provides the voice for Elsa in Walt Disney's aFrozena, released 5 years ago today. "Frozen" remains the highest grossing animated movie ever. Its sequel is expected next November.

[view sources](https://smarthernews.com/quote-of-the-day-2/)
